channel.title: Client help!
channel.description:
hey all, i download source with client and i changed every thing i want i downloaded no-ip and all are true but the server keep offline to other ppl that mean that the serve is at ip 127.0.0.1 but i dont know how to change it my problem is that it keeps offline and i dont know why!!!
so if you want to help me just tell me how to do it onlline
[q] how i know its offline [a] my friends tried to log into it but :\
